lead_paragraph: GREENBERG--Henry "Hank". We sadly announce the death of Hank Greenberg, one of the true legends in retailing. He set a standard in leadership that is strived for to this day. He is survived by his beloved wife and best friend, Roz, they were married 64 years, his adored children, Bonnie, Randy, and Amy, and his devoted grandchildren. Funeral services will be at Monmouth Reform Temple on June 2nd at 11am. Shiva will be at the home of Bonnie Klein. Donations in his memory may be made to Monmouth Medical Center Foundation or the Visiting Nurse Association of Central New Jersey. 1/3
